products.title: WARRIOR MAT
products.description: it’s roomy, perfectly cushioned for joint support, anti-odor, dry-wicking and slip-free, wet or dry. It’s also 100% formaldehyde-free, non-toxic and PVC-free.

products.description: Practice with better alignment using the asana-guiding grid etched into the luxe Chakra Alignment Mat.

products.title: AIR MAT
products.description: Dry-wicking surface draws moisture away. Natural rubber backing offers the perfect amount of cushioning. Anti-odor.

products.title: TIE DYE WARRIOR MAT

products.title: CAMO WARRIOR MAT
products.description: Camo alert! Our yogi-approved & non-toxic, “magic” Warrior Mat is here in a cool, now print.

products.title: LONG WARRIOR MAT
products.description: with 10” more length to sink into poses—especially for taller yogis. Anti-odor.

products.title: PRIDE WARRIOR MAT
products.description: Part of our limited-edition Pride 2021 capsule benefitting the Trevor Project
